decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The proposed digital advertisements and their change in frequency of the advertisements would prejudice highway safety and cause a distraction to drivers. The proposal would be contrary to the London Borough of Hounslow adopted Local Plan policies CC1 (Context and Character), CC2 (Context and Character), CC5 (Adverts), EC2 (Developing a sustainable local transport network) and the intent of the National Planning Policy Framework.  
The proposed digital advertisements in terms of their size, scale and illumination would harm the visual amenity of the area and the setting of a grade II listed building. The proposal would be contrary to the London Borough of Hounslow adopted Local Plan policies CC1 (Context and Character), CC2 (Context and Character), CC5 (Adverts), CC4 (Heritage) and the intent of the National Planning Policy Framework.
description: Replacement of the existing advertising structure with a proposed displays comprising two digital displays measuring 5m x 10m
